Description: Media Services Application Mapper (MSAM) cloud API (ID: DEV_0_0_0)

Properties.Description: MSAM Lambda for handling CloudWatch alarm notifications
MSAM Lambda for periodically updating the node cache
MSAM Lambda for peridically updating the connection cache
MSAM Lambda for polling CloudWatch alarm states
MSAM Lambda for handling API Gateway REST calls

AlarmsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores alarm states for MSAM.
AlarmsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

ChannelsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores channel definitions for MSAM.
ChannelsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

ContentTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores cached content for MSAM.
ContentTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

EventsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that collects events for MSAM.
EventsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

LayoutTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores diagram layout for MSAM.
LayoutTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

SettingsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores configuration settings for MSAM.
SettingsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

CacheItemTTL.Description: This is the maximum time in seconds a cached item will remain if never updated.
CacheItemTTL.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.
